stepper_controller.allegro_controller package¶

Submodules¶

stepper_controller.allegro_controller.controller module¶

class stepper_controller.allegro_controller.controller.AllegroControls(**kwargs)¶

Bases: object

A class to control an Allegro stepper driver carrier like the Pololu A4988

Parameters:

kwargs –

Keyword Arguments:
 
stepper (dict) –

Optionally pass in a dict to override the default GPIO pins found in DefaultStepperPins.default_allegro You can replace any / all of the following keys: dir | step | enable | vdd | microstep - ms1 | ms2 | ms3
close()¶

Shuts down the motor and cleans up GPIO pins

microstep(resolution)¶
Parameters:(str) (resolution) – The resolution of each step - options are FULL, HALF, QUARTER, EIGHTH, and SIXTEENTH
motor_forward()¶

Moves the motor forward in a separate thread

motor_setup()¶

Sets up the motor (sets the direction and enable pins to LOW)

pause()¶

Pauses the motor’s movement
